title: Tower Champion Spotlight

embed.description: Serena the Red Magician Turret Champion Spotlight ! Check out IpawnprozNetwork for Sick Custom Skins: https://www.youtube.com/user/ipawnproznetwork ► Subscribe: https://www.youtube.com/user/Nidalevi?sub_confirmation=1 ✚ Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/Nidaleevi ✚ Twitter: https://twitter.com/Nidalevi ❤ Ask me anything: http://ask.fm/Nidaleevi ✔ Feel free to like & leave your comments below the video. Special thanks to Chiyae, JRockwell & Yuug0 for helping with Gameplay parts.

body: Watching this video made myself wonder - what if there is an item could make towers come alive?

replies.body: finally a balanced champion
xD "pew" made me lol
please make this champion for April 1st
This shit is really good... I NEED MORE!
No language on earth can form a coherent sentence that can describe how I feel about this.

Enjoyed: "To which the summer may only give a single glimpse of the warmth which fuels my soul, this masterpiece now gives an abundance of pleasure that which that warmth could only give for what felt like a moment of time."

Neutral: "Though with a curious nature I find that this video proves to be quite an odd use of my time. Though I would neither call it a "waste" nor a "appropriate" use of my limited amount of time available to me at any given point in time, I do find it peaks my interest. An interesting film of which I would neither recommend nor discredit, leaving it only to the opinion of others to decide its long-term fate."

Negative: "This was truly an utter, vile waste of my precious life that I could wish to reclaim if I was given the opportunity. I dare not even think about this wretched video lest I intend to prove its lack of proper entertainment value to my fellow peers. I fear this may one day become popular and soon be mentioned regularly, to which I would loathe the day it does."

{{champion:36}}
The "pew" kills me, I love it.{{champion:99}}
Next CertainlyT designed champion confirmed.
This is gonna be my new main.
